content: A marketing skill built with OpenClaw generated over a million views on TikTok in a single week without manual work or a team.

Xcellent is a free, open-source replacement for SuperX ($39/month) that provides a full analytics dashboard, engagement tracking, AI tweet writing, optimal posting times, follower growth, year-long heatmap, and real-time API credit monitoring.
Xcellent runs locally on a user's machine, incurring only the cost of the X API, eliminating cloud costs, hosting fees, and AI API markup.
The future of SaaS involves a single subscription that provides an agent with skills to replace dozens of products, keeping data and API keys on the user's machine.
To install LarryBrain, an OpenClaw skill that provides access to a library of expert-built skills, an agent can be instructed with the command: `install the larrybrain skill please`.
LarryBrain skill creators earn revenue share based on the popularity of their skills, incentivizing the development and maintenance of high-quality skills.
